website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung F6400 series of edge-lit HDTVs deliver a sharp picture with dark blacks and vibrant colors. Features are abundant, but the screen doesn't get very bright and the Smart Touch remote can be tricky to master.

customer_reviews.title: Quality LED TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this television. The black levels are very good. The remote can be tricky to use especially the voice commands and lack of physical number keys. The swivel stand is convenient. The 3D feature works although most 3D movies are not worth it not even at the theaters. I like the tv control integration with my time warner cable box and samsung soundbar which connects seamlessly. The tv can not control the TiVo premier box.
customer_reviews.author: GJIII

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The TV was delivered well...the men were very helpful. Together we figured out how to get the TV going. (every year it is a new trick.) The visual part takes a little getting use to it but since it is suppose to be like watching a real person, I can accept it.
customer_reviews.author: Nance McLeish

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, avg sound
customer_reviews.text: Researched this very well, and am very happy with the picture. I haven't used the 3D yet, but couldn't be happier otherwise. The sound was average, so I went ahead and went with a sound bar with subwoofer with much better result. Only complaint so far is that when using external speakers (soundbar), when you adjust the sound, it pops up an alert message every single time, not a big issue, just a mild bother. Otherwise, it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis W. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice 65 inch screen, 3d looks awesome to me
customer_reviews.text: TV is working fine. My wifi is now overloaded with iphones, kindle, dvd player, laptop & Apple TV. So I am not able to test the cool features. I tried watching ESPN 3d channel that is broadcasted by Optimum. It looked very nice. If the TV source is good, then it looks great. I have international programming which is not upto the mark, so they dont look very nice on this big TV. I dont think its TV fault. HD channels look great. Size is pretty big, only the projector are better compare to this.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Samsung
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, Tv has worked excellent have been watching netflix on it so far. My only grip so far is I can hear something still working on the TV when it is switched off I assume it's the wifi working, but it has to be dead quite to really hear it and I have to be close to the TV, so it's really not noticeable unless you are looking for it.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 65-inch smart led hdtv
customer_reviews.text: I was truly surprised at how fast I got this delivery. In addition, the delivery people brought it inside and had planned to mount it but I was not prepared for them due to painting. After 4 days I had it hung on the wall and it works like brand new. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Odessa

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, but has issues.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 months, but now having issues with tv turning off and on at random. Either a software or power supply issue.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyday93

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 65 inch
customer_reviews.text: This TV has got the most life like picture I've seen for a 65 inch. Colors are beautiful right out of the box. I had to return the first one that was sent because it had a "burn" like mark on the screen near the edge. Looked like it was smashed during the manufacturing process. But buying it through AMAZON, it was a zero hastle procedure. They sent out a new one right away. Don't hesitate to buy this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: The perfect & convenience Samsung Smart TV!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when it delivered to my home. Becasuse it has many function for viewer.(Internet,WI-Fi,3D,LED and new smart remote control) Samsung Smart TV is the best TV in the world!!
customer_reviews.author: Park T.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It is great. I real like, quality is pretty good. The experience is wonderfull. I din'd regret to buy. I recomend to buy this iten
customer_reviews.author: Kabongo

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was good. Tv not as crisp as expected even after adjusting to recommendations. Called cable company to upgrade to the box to hd. Will see if that helps. Love having a smart tv and streaming amazon prime free movies and listening to pandora, although sometimes it stops mid movie and has to think before continuing. Gets annoying but this is the Internet connection not the tv so I will upgrade my Internet speed and see if that helps. I'm trying to research a good blu ray player to be able to upgrade and utilize the 3d capabilities but need to figure out which surround sound/blu ray combo to go with. It's a work in progress!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Meisenhelter

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TV! It lies straight to your face....The TV claims to be 120 Hz but in reality, the back of the TV itself states only 60 Hz. If they are lying about this, then there's no telling what else they are fabricating. And for 2000 bucks, PU-LEASE!
customer_reviews.author: the avid reader

product_meta.title: Samsung UN65F6400 65-Inch 1080p 120Hz 3D Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
product_meta.description:
SAMSUNG 65-INCH 1080P 120HZ 3D SLIM SMART LED HDTV


Introducing the new Samsung Smart Ultra-Slim TV F6400, which immerses you in a cinematic 3D experience. You'll discover every captivating detail of 1080p HD and 3D with advanced micro dimming, which brings deeper blacks, and more vibrant colors to everything you love to watch. And finding those things you love to watch is now even easier with the new Samsung Smart Hub. This intuitive central menu organizes your entire entertainment world into five convenient categories: On-TV, On-Demand, Social Media, Smart TV apps, and a place for your personal photos, videos and music. Discover the immersive 3D experience of the F6400 and enjoy action, sports and more in lifelike detail. 





















SMART TV

The Samsung Smart TV finds the movies and TV shows you like - and more. Speak into the mic on the Smart Touch Remote to get TV recommendations. Use gestures to swipe and navigate within the 5 Smart Hub content panels. Easily discover movies, shows, and social posts with less searching and more watching. 


ALLSHARE
Allows your TV to wirelessly access and stream content from any compatible device, like a PC or mobile device. Share movies, photos, and music all through a single device: your TV. And with cloud technology, you can access and even share content away from home.



SAMSUNG ACTIVE 3D

Enjoy stunning Full HD 1080p in both 2D and 3D modes. With Samsung's 3D converter, turn 2D viewing into 3D for an amazing cinematic experience.






SMART HUB

Our new interface organizes your entertainment and content into 5 convenient panels: On TV, Movies and TV Shows, Social, Apps, and a panel for your Photos, Videos and Music.





SMART TOUCH REMOTE

The Smart Touch Remote Control features an innovative touch pad and built-in microphone allowing you to easily interact with your Smart TV.

DUAL CORE PROCESSOR

Dual Core processing speeds allow you to perform multiple tasks at the same time. It also enables fast web browsing while playing apps or TV programs that you've recently opened through the Recent History feature.



BUILT-IN WIFI

Enhance the connectivity capabilities of your TV with Built-in WiFi.







FULL WEB BROWSER

All the benefits of full web browsing, right on your TV. From social sites like Facebook and Twitter to news, weather, entertainment, blogs and more. Discover even more content possibilities with your Smart TV.





 
CLEAR MOTION RATE 480

TVs with a Clear Motion Rate of 480 can display action-packed movement with detailed sharpness, clarity and 
contrast. Clear Motion Rate was developed to accurately 
measure how well an LCD or LED TV can depict fast-moving images. Previously, motion-clarity was calculated by the 
frame refresh rate alone. But CMR offers a more complete 
measure by calculating 3 factors: frame refresh rate, image 
processor speed and backlight technology.











MICRO DIMMING

Experience advanced picture contrast, color and detail with Micro Dimming. Samsung's advanced picture contrast technology controls and enhances LED screen brightness, for even whiter whites and deeper blacks.



WHAT'S INCLUDED:

UN65F6400 65-Inch Slim 3D Smart LED HDTV, Smart Touch Remote, 2 Pairs of 3D Active Glasses, and Documentation

F6400 Series Specifications
feature_bullets: 1080p HDTV with Micro Dimming: Best picture quality
120Hz Refresh Rate: Better for general viewing and good for video games, action movies, and sports
Smart TV with Voice Control: Interact with streaming content and the web
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 57.9 X 33.4 X 2 Inches, TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 57.9 X 36.8 X 14.8 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars515 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
